entry.title: Glass Wings
entry.summary:
Author: TheDaisyRoots

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,190Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 34

Summary: A rag-tag group of gold-hearted criminals, the Stray Kids Gang is dominant heavy and in desperate need of a submissive to balance out their eros. Luckily, the latest stray brought in by their leader is the adorable touch starved sub, Lee Felix. When Felix bumps into dom Chan after months of self-neglect to his needs, instinct sends him to his knees — literally. With his health on the line, Felix reluctantly agrees to stay with the eros until he can recover, but quickly becomes attached to everyone — everyone except intimidating dom Hyunjin, who grows increasingly agitated by Felix’s attitude. Can Felix swallow his pride long enough to allow Hyunjin to care for him, too? OR; Traumatized sub Felix learns how to accept himself through the love of his new eros — after Hyunjin tames the brat out of him. OT8, with main emphasis on Hyunlix and Chanlix.

entry.title: bottoms up
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,875Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 45

Summary: There's the sound of his bedroom door opening at the same time he finally gets the collar fastened around his neck. Turning around, Jeongin's eyes meet Chan's, his whole being feeling smaller, more fragile than he has in years. "I-Is this right, hyung?" Jeongin stutters out, eyes never leaving Chan's despite how embarrassed he feels having been caught like this, so vulnerable. Is he wearing it correctly? Does he look like a fool? Does he look ridiculous, like a child playing dress up?  Chan steps closer, and Jeongin waits with bated breath as he approaches, footsteps quiet on the carpeted floor. "Oh, baby," the older coos. "No, that's not right at all," he says, stopping in front of Jeongin. Chan silently lifts a hand, his index finger looping between the gap of the collar and Jeongin's throat. He pulls it down, bringing Jeongin a few inches closer, right in front of Chan's focused face. "Good pets wait for their master to give them presents, and don't go taking them for themselves." Or: Jeongin opens a package, thinking it was for him, only to be caught by Chan, who dolls out the perfect punishment.

entry.title: Not Just An NDA
entry.summary:
Author: DeluluHr

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,994Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 12

Summary: What if your ult bias was also a fan of yours? That was Rose's new reality. She had been a STAY for years and had recently begun growing her own following after vlogging her concert experience. Over a year after attending her first Stray Kids concert she gets to meet the man that she's been obsessing over just to find out that he was beginning to obsess over her too. Tag along as they figure out how to fit in each others worlds.“So, the one that I refer to as my invisible string or red thread theory was during one of their previous concerts. I.N wasn’t steady but it wasn’t too noticeable, and in the clip, you can see Chan look at I.N while trying to stay in formation then immediately jump into action and catch him. I saw it on Instagram before I knew anything about K-Pop and remember being really drawn to him, to Chan I mean, but I didn’t end up looking into the group past that and only saw the video once but it stuck with me. I saw it again after letting my friend teach me their names and it hit all over again.”orMy friends and I spent way to much joking about potential "y/n" experiences during the dominATE tour and I decided to actually write it down.

entry.title: Lucky Girl
entry.summary:
Author: karmaswhiskee

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 129,379Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 170

Summary: “GIRL!” Alicia unleashes a muffled scream. “You fucking won! Oh my God, you fucking actually won!”“Dude, what? What did I win?”“The competition to become the ‘9th member’ of Stray Kids for a year! This is the letter babe! Oh my god, I need autographs, you have to promise!”I sigh. “Alicia, slow down. I know they’re having this competition, but I didn’t enter, so this literally cannot be real.”“That’s because we entered for you!”Every sound around me suddenly disappears; all I can hear is the thudding pulse in my eardrums. No way. “Wha-what? Who’s we?”“Okay. Remember how I told you this was a special birthday and that you’d never forget your twenty-first?”“Yes…”
